project_experiences.name: AI Art Generation
highlights: Fine-tuned Stability AIâ€™s Stable Diffusion XL text-to-image model using the Low Rank Adaptation (LoRA) technique. Used it to create concept anime art that was subsequently sold as an NFT, and vector logos to cover branding projects and creative concepts.

project_experiences.name: Voice Controlled AI Robot
highlights: Built a robot using embedded system like the Arduino, and then leveraged data science methods like PCA to perform dimensionality reduction, and voice matching to enable it to respond to voice commands.

work_experiences.description: Built the founding software and concept for an AI system. Led the technical side of the pitch and secured the company a pre-seed round at a $1B valuation. Published an open-source package viewable on PyPI (refyre) to streamline local file management and built a command-line interface allowing customers to access MongoDB and DigitalOcean data.
metadata: Question: When did you do X @ flockfysh? : Answer --> 48 days ago ...

work_experiences.description: Utilized TensorFlow 2.0 to contribute to an Artificial Intelligence (AI) based product that automate Sports (tennis), Dance, Yoga, and Physiotherapy coaching. Developed YOLO model and trained to perform action recognition with 85% accuracy. Developed ball detection algorithms in C++ and patented the technology which is utilized for sports like tennis.

Worked on software development using Python to automate the process of calculating the guide RNAs for various proteins. The process utilized contemporary biotechnology AI software such as AlphaFold, Equidock, and Equibind for accuracy and prediction.

relevant_coursework: Structure and Interpretation of Computer Programs
Designing Information Devices and Systems I

certificates.name: deeplearning.ai TensorFlow Developer Certification
highlights: Developed and achieved proficiency in building models in the computer vision, natural language processing, and time series domain.
